content.query:
-- Read multiple files with same schema
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK (
            'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202201-citibike-tripdata.csv',
			'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202202-citibike-tripdata.csv',
			'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202203-citibike-tripdata.csv',
			'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202204-citibike-tripdata.csv',
			'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202205-citibike-tripdata.csv',
			'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202206-citbike-tripdata.csv',
			'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/2022/202207-citbike-tripdata.csv'
        ),
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


-- Create Synapse SQL Serverless database
create database biketrips collate Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;

-- Use the new database
use biketrips;

-- Create master key for encryption, only do this once.
-- Using:!r@PMK5cfCWn%f#qJjmJ
create master key encryption by password='INSERT HERE';

-- Create scoped credential
create database scoped credential WorkspaceIdentity with identity = 'Managed Identity';
go

-- Create external data source
create external data source biketrips_raw_source with (location = 'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/calembel/01-raw/biketrips/', credential=WorkspaceIdentity);


-- Create external file formats
create external file format ParquetExternalFormat with (format_type=PARQUET);
go

create external file format CSVExternalFormat with (format_type=DELIMITEDTEXT);
go

-- Explore some data
select top 10  *
from openrowset(
    bulk '2022/', 
    data_source = 'biketrips_raw_source', 
    format='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) as a


-- Drop table 
drop external table dbo.biketrips202207;

-- Create a table
create external table dbo.biketrips202207 (
     ride_id             varchar(100)
    ,rideable_type       varchar(100)
    ,started_at          varchar(100)
    ,ended_at            varchar(100)
    ,start_station_name  varchar(100)
    ,start_station_id    varchar(100)
    ,end_station_name    varchar(100)
    ,end_station_id      varchar(100)
    ,start_lat           varchar(100)
    ,start_lng           varchar(100)
    ,end_lat             varchar(100)
    ,end_lng             varchar(100)
    ,member_casual       varchar(100)
) with (
     data_source= biketrips_raw_source
    ,location = '2022/202207-citbike-tripdata.csv'
    ,file_format = CSVExternalFormat
);


-- Query new external table
select top 10 * from dbo.biketrips202207;
